content: I stopped using omz because of some very slow prompt color mechanism. I too had my ‘meh they suxx’ but I didn’t have twitter at the time. Luckily, because in retrospect I feel it’s pretty violent. I wouldn’t like to take anger from random people for a bunch of code I published. OMZ was nice, it’s cool to see how it was born and grew, thanks for the work. Good luck with the rest.
